label: 発心集
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: Buddhist tale collection compiled by 鴨長明 Kamo no chōmei between 1212 and 1215, particularly influenced by earlier collections of stories of Japanese who attained birth in the Pure Land (往生伝 ōjōden).
